DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effect food pharmacokinetics safety administration ASP8825 healthy non-elderly adult male subject .
DOC.brief_title: ASP8825 - A Study Investigate Food Effect Pharmacokinetics ASP8825
DOC.criteria: Body weight : ≥50.0 kg < 80.0 kg Body mass index BMI : ≥17.6 < 26.4 [ BMI= Body weight ( kg ) / ( Height ( ) ) 2 ] Subjects receive study drug clinical trial postmarketing study within 120 day screen Subjects receive scheduled receive medication ( include overthecounter [ OTC ] drug ) within seven day hospital admission day period 1 . Subjects deviate normal range blood pressure , pulse rate , body temperature standard 12lead ECG screen hospital admission day period 1 Subjects meet criterion laboratory test screen hospital admission day period 1 . Normal range test specify study site test/assay organization use normal range study . Subjects complication drug allergy Subjects develop upper gastrointestinal symptom ( e.g. , nausea , vomit , stomachache ) within seven day hospital admission day period 1 Subjects complication history hepatic disease ( hepatitis viral druginduced liver injury , etc . ) Subjects complication history heart disease ( cardiac failure congestive , angina pectoris arrhythmia require treatment , etc . ) Subjects complication history respiratory disease ( severe asthma bronchial bronchitis chronic , etc . ) ( except history nonsevere infantile asthma ) Subjects complication history alimentary disease ( severe peptic ulcer , reflux esophagitis , etc . ) ( except history appendicitis ) Subjects complication history renal disease ( acute kidney injury , glomerulonephritis , nephritis interstitial , etc . ) ( except history calculus ) Subjects complication history cerebrovascular disorder ( cerebral infarction , etc . ) Subjects complication history malignant tumor Subjects habit excessive alcohol drink smoke Subjects previously receive administration ASP8825
